name: Will Zee
description:
Have you ever wondered where little zillas came from. Or where did they go to? Is there life after all destroyed cities and vehicles?  You will find answers in this little nokia style game. Collect 3 powerups to upgrade the hero, the world, the game, controls, and maybe partially yourself. Ofc to advance to next level too.  If you die you lose your current powerup and return to previous level.

Controls : WSAD or arrows.

length of the game completely depends on rgn.  Leave in comments your score if you manage to beat the game.  Will see who is the luckiest and has least score. And see what is the secret all this little lizards are hiding from us.
